name: Flowery Fields
description:
In this game, you play as a young kid who's in a failing middle class family. As a last resort, your parents gave you some money to use your own imagination to make some money. Of course, as someone who loves flowers, you started a flower farm!

Notes:

The game autosaves everyday or when you quit the game

The popups will show you how to play as your progress and discover things

Half the popups will probably contains grammar mistakes because they were made last minute before publishing. Sorry about that.

Also apparently I broke the pollination thing and probably forgot to fix it, sorry.
